insa.h4401.utils

Interface Publisher

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Map, Planning, Route

    public interface Publisher
    This interface describes a Publisher object, or "data" in the model-view paradigm. It can be subclassed to represent an object that the application wants to have observed. A Publisher object can have one or more subsriber, which is an object that implements interface subsriber. After an object that implement Publisher changes, it has to call to the update method of the subscribers. The order in which notifications will be delivered is unspecified.
    Author:
    Lisa, Estelle, Antoine, Pierre, Hugues, Guillaume, Paul
